snippet.title: AquaDream - Official Early Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Page : https://store.steampowered.com/app/3093840/AquaDream/

Dive into the mesmerizing depths of the ocean with AquaDream, our upcoming puzzle-adventure game! In this official early gameplay reveal trailer, you'll get a first look at the enchanting underwater world, innovative puzzles, and captivating gameplay that awaits you.

In AquaDream, you control a charming anglerfish on a quest to navigate through intricate underwater mazes, solve challenging puzzles, and discover hidden treasures. Activate towers to create new passages, follow the ocean currents, and avoid dangerous traps. Collect beautiful shells and uncover secrets in this immersive underwater adventure inspired by the music and vibe of Donkey Kong Country.

If you want to stay updated, here our socials ; https://mylink.la/gossiamgames
